snippet: A number of language immersion programs are offered in places like the Tuscan hills and Costa Rica, in classes specifically for older people or for a mix of age groups.
abstract: Senior citizens are taking advantage of a number of language immersion programs offered in places like Costa Rica; many say that learning a new language keeps their minds sharp and enhances their travel experiences.
